card.name: DNA Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

card.name: Crysta, First Squad
card.text: ■ Your Metallica cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Sokola, Strange Stone
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Setsunano Sabato
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, put one of your shields into your graveyard.

card.name: Three Sword's Judgment
card.text: ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may take a spell or a Metallica from among them, show that card to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on top of one of your shields instead.

card.name: Icarino Sabato
card.text: ■ Whenever a card is put into your shield zone, choose one of your opponent's creature and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's turn.

card.name: Keijimeno Sabato
card.text: ■ Whenever a card is added to your shields, this creature gets +3000 power and has "double breaker" until the End Step

card.name: Furious Broken Mask Judgment
card.text: ■ Draw a card. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on top of one of your shields Face Up

card.name: Soprano Sabato/Melodious Melody
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Last Burst ========================= ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap up to 2 of your opponent's creatures.
